item.title: In the last 24 hours, 4 whale addresses withdrew a total of 404,800 LINK from Binance.
item.description: On August 17th, according to The Data Nerd's monitoring, in the past 24 hours, 4 whales withdrew a total of more than 404,000 LINK from Binance.- 0x99b: Withdrew 102,250 LINK, which is approximately worth $2.47 million. It now holds 273,000 LINK, which is approximately worth $6.6 million.- 0x4a8: Withdrew 43,133 LINK, approximately worth $1.04 million. It holds 312,300 LINK, approximately worth $7.7 million.- 0xa36: Withdrew 169,600 LINK, approximately worth $4.14 million. It holds 275,000 LINK, approximately worth $7.7 million.- 0x4EB: Withdrew 89,900 LINK, approximately worth $2.17 million. It holds 721,300 LINK, approximately worth $17.44 million.

item.title: Analysis: Companies like Circle, Stripe, etc., are creating proprietary blockchains to have their own settlement layer, aiming to enhance the efficiency, compliance, and revenue of digital asset pa...
item.description: August 17th. Circle and Stripe are engaged in building their proprietary blockchain, becoming part of an ever-growing number of projects that are aiming to launch stablecoin and asset tokenization chains. Startups Plasma and Stable have recently obtained funds for developing a dedicated chain for USDT. Securitize is collaborating with Ethena to construct Converge. Ondo Finance announced earlier this year about its upcoming native chain. And just a few days ago, Dinari indicated that it will soon launch a layer-1 network powered by Avalanche for the settlement and clearance of tokenized stocks.Cryptocurrency bank Sygnum's Chief Client Officer Martin Burgherr stated, "Constructing your own L1 is related to control and strategic positioning. The economics of stablecoins are determined by settlement speed, interoperability, and regulatory coordination. Thus, having a foundational layer enables companies to directly embed compliance, integrate forex engines, and ensure predictable fees."

item.title: An address suspected to be associated with cryptocurrency investor Rudy Kadoch has transferred approximately 1,976,000 CRV to Binance.
item.description: On August 17th, according to Arkham's monitoring data, about nine hours ago, an address that is suspected to be related to cryptocurrency investor Rudy Kadoch transferred approximately 1,976,000 CRV to Binance, with a value of approximately $1.72 million.

item.title: Solana Achieves Historic High with Single Block Max TPS Reaching 107,664 Times
item.description: On August 17th, the Solana network reached a single-block peak transaction throughput of 107,664 transactions per second (TPS), establishing a new all-time high for the network. (Solana Floor)

item.title: CEX Ethereum Reserve Continues to Decline, Now Only 18.39METH
item.description: On August 17th, according to on-chain data from CryptoQuant, the reserve of Ethereum on centralized exchanges (CEX) continues to decline. Currently, only 18.39 million ETH remains, which is the lowest level since October 2022.A similar trend is also observed with Bitcoin. The current reserve of Bitcoin on CEX is around 2.52 million BTC, and it is also at the lowest level since October 2022.

item.title: The majority of investors participating in the US Bank Global Fund Manager Survey still have a "zero" cryptocurrency exposure.
item.description: On August 17th, Nate Geraci, the co-founder of The ETF Institute, mentioned in a post on the X Platform that the vast majority of investors taking part in the Global Fund Manager Survey conducted by a US bank still have a "zero" allocation to cryptocurrency. Among the few investors with exposure, the average portfolio allocation is 3.2%.

item.title: LINK Surges Over 13% in 24 Hours, Potentially Driven by LINK's Reserve Risk and On-Chain Inflows
item.description: On August 17th, based on HTX market information, LINK surged by more than 13% in the past 24 hours and is currently priced at $24.9125.Chainlink launched the "LINK Reserves Plan" at the beginning of August. It proportionally converts on-chain oracle network revenue and off-chain enterprise service earnings into LINK token reserves. The current reserve size has exceeded one million dollars. In the long term, it will form a supply shock through a continuous buyback mechanism, enhancing the token's value capture ability.Furthermore, in the past 30 days, LINK has seen a net on-chain inflow of 275,002 tokens ($6.65 million), while CEX reserves have dropped to an 18-month low. Whale holdings have increased from 37% in June to 42%, indicating that institutional-grade funds are accelerating their positions.

item.title: U.S. President Trump: Made Significant Progress with Russia, Stay Tuned
item.description: On August 17th, US President Trump announced a significant breakthrough in the relations with Russia. Please stay tuned.

item.title: A trader went long on ETH through a rolling contract and made $296 million from $125,000 in 4 months.
item.description: On August 17th, as monitored by LookOnChain, a trader managed to convert $125,000 into $29.6 million within just 4 months by going long on ETH, achieving a return of 236 times.Four months ago, he deposited $125,000 into Hyperliquid and began going long on ETH through 2 accounts. Then, he cleverly compounded his profits by reinvesting every dollar of gain into his ETH long position, thereby building a massive 66,749 ETH position (worth $303 million).The total equity of his 2 accounts has now increased from $125,000 to $29.6 million.

item.title: Dune Testnet Data for Monad is now live
item.description: On August 17th, as per official information, the Monad testnet data has been initiated on Dune. Since the commencement of the Monad testnet, there have been more than 2.44 billion successful transactions, attaining a peak in early August with 34 million transactions per day. Additionally, approximately 3 million creators have deployed over 34 million contracts.
